titles.title: A resolution to refer S.1335 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian Tribe of Wisconsin" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Refers S. 1335 (a bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian Tribe of Wisconsin) to the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
